headline: Bill Clinton Caught Checking Out Kathy Hochul at Press Conference Promoting Climate-Friendly Buildings
author: Christina Laila
sentences: Bill Clinton delivered remarks at the Empire State Building.“If we could do an Empire State job on every sizable building in every city in America in the next two years, we would probably buy 20 years of more time before the worst consequences of climate change come down on us like a ton of bricks,” Clinton said.

Former President Bill Clinton this week joined NYC Mayor Eric Adams and NY Governor Kathy Hochul to promote the release of the “Empire Building playbook” – a blueprint to make buildings climate-friendly.
Bill Clinton got caught checking out Governor Hochul as she delivered remarks.Maybe it was the blue dress?
